articles.author: Matthew Hughes
articles.title: Amazon's new Alexa-powered Fire TV stick lands in the UK
articles.description: The new Fire TV Stick with Alexa is finally (finally!) making its way to the UK.

articles.author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
articles.title: WhatsApp returns to its roots with its Snapchat-style Status feature
articles.description: Last September, we saw a Snapchat-like beta feature in WhatsApp that let you share photos, videos and GIFs as your 'Status'. It's now ready for prime-time.
